title: Chunky watermelon and cucumber salad
ingredients: ['700 g (1 lb 9 oz) watermelon', '½ cucumber', '40 g (1½ oz) stoned black olives in brine, drained', 'For the dressing', '25 g (1 oz) feta cheese, rinsed and dried', '3 tablespoons low-fat natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To garnish: sprigs of fresh dill', 'To serve: crusty wholemeal bread, optional']
